column4: apport on 11.04 is buggy. can't file bug report because it faults out. any ideas how to report the fail ?
faults out, does apport crash or say that type of crash can't be reported? also, you might try #ubuntu+1
windows pops up says sorry, apport has unexpectantly closed. do you wish to file a bug report blah blah, click to report and system freeses
peculiar, afaik apport is mostly python, if it were crashing something would be seriously amiss
